description:
Farma accompanies his father Bruno on his house call to the Empress. He realizes he has the ability to cure her, but he can`t do so without drawing attention that would put him in jeopardy.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Hittou Kyuutei Kusushi to Tensei Yakugakusha
Le Médecin-chef de la cour et l`élève apothicaire réincarné
The Chief Royal Pharmacian and the Reincarnated Pharmacologist
筆頭宮廷薬師と転生薬学者
